title: FaangPrepTracker - Company Wise Problems
description: FaangPrepTracker helps developers prepare for FAANG and top tech company interviews by providing company-specific LeetCode problems. Easily filter by company, difficulty, and track progress—all in one place. 🚀 Built with Next.js, Clerk, and Tailwind CSS, it streamlines interview prep like never before. Whether you're aiming for Google, Amazon, or Meta, FaangPrepTracker ensures you're solving the right problems. Start coding smarter today! 💡🔥
